remarks: Value of the group sum operation over the pair ` { 1 , 2 } ` . (Contributed by AV, 14-Dec-2018.)
statement:
gsumpr12val.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumpr12val.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumpr12val.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. V ) $.
gsumpr12val.f $e |- ( ph -> F : { 1 , 2 } --> B ) $.
gsumpr12val $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( ( F ` 1 ) .+ ( F ` 2 ) ) ) $.
